entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
